Module imagingbook.spectral
Package imagingbook.spectral.dct

Interface Dct1d.Double

All Superinterfaces:
Dct1d
All Known Implementing Classes:
Dct1dDirect.Double, Dct1dFast.Double, Dct1dSlow
Enclosing interface:
Dct1d
public static interface Dct1d.Double extends Dct1d
Sub-interface for 1D DCT implementations operating on double data.

    getSize

  • Method Details

    • forward

      void forward(double[] g)
      Performs an "in-place" 1D DCT forward transformation on the supplied data. The input signal is replaced by the associated DFT spectrum.
      Parameters:
      g - the signal to be transformed (modified)

    • inverse

      void inverse(double[] G)
      Performs an "in-place" 1D DCT inverse transformation on the supplied spectrum. The input spectrum is replaced by the associated signal.
      Parameters:
      G - the spectrum to be transformed (modified)

    • checkSize

      default void checkSize(double[] a)
